Agent Ammar - Comm100 has joined the chat.
[2022/05/10 22:58:36]:Ammar - Comm100:Hello Jeremy Dunn, thank you for contacting us! How may I help you?
[2022/05/10 22:59:06]:Jeremy Dunn:How do I get information that the bot gathers to be able to be copied?  
The visitor has sent a file: image.png
[2022/05/10 23:00:16]:Jeremy Dunn:I can copy the role under custom field but I can't copy anything under ""information collected by chatbot demo InfoSource""
[2022/05/10 23:00:57]:Ammar - Comm100:Hello
[2022/05/10 23:01:14]:Ammar - Comm100:Yeah you cannot copy it
[2022/05/10 23:01:44]:Jeremy Dunn:How do I either get it in a place I can copy it or make it possible to copy? 
[2022/05/10 23:02:48]:Ammar - Comm100:Unfortunately you cannot 
[2022/05/10 23:04:10]:Jeremy Dunn:Is that something that is on the road map to change?  When a customer fills out a pre chat form and sends it things from that form can be copied.  Is there a reason it can't be copied from what the bot gathers? 
[2022/05/10 23:05:15]:Ammar - Comm100:That’s something I’ll need to check with our engineers 
[2022/05/10 23:05:39]:Ammar - Comm100:But yes I see the importance of that 
[2022/05/10 23:06:09]:Jeremy Dunn:Would it be helpful if I wrote an email asking for it? 
[2022/05/10 23:06:36]:Ammar - Comm100:You could also do that 
[2022/05/10 23:06:46]:Jeremy Dunn :Will do, thank you 
[2022/05/10 23:06:52]:Ammar - Comm100:No problem 
[2022/05/10 23:07:04]:Jeremy Dunn :Have a good day 
The transcript will be sent to ""Jeremiah.Dunn@extendhealth.com"" after the chat ends.

The chat is ended.(2022/05/10 23:07:21)

[2022/05/10 17:29:27]:Lucas - Comm100:Hi Emre, this is Lucas with Comm100. How may I help you?
[2022/05/10 17:29:34]:Emre:hi.
[2022/05/10 17:29:52]:Lucas - Comm100:Hello
[2022/05/10 17:30:13]:Emre:My credit cart hacked , i will wait new credit card.
[2022/05/10 17:30:37]:Emre:I expected it to come today but it didn't
[2022/05/10 17:30:44]:Emre:my account now suspend :) pls help me.
[2022/05/10 17:30:58]:Emre:I request you to extend 15 days
[2022/05/10 17:31:19]:Emre:Currently unavailable to our customers
[2022/05/10 17:31:36]:Emre:I will be glad if you help
[2022/05/10 17:32:29]:Lucas - Comm100:Understood. System shows you are expected to pay on 04/25/2022, it's due for over 2 weeks. You want another 15 days, you have to reach your account manager Brian
[2022/05/10 17:33:11]:Lucas - Comm100:Do you have his Skype?
[2022/05/10 17:33:19]:Emre:i dont have.
[2022/05/10 17:33:22]:Lucas - Comm100:Skype: keyi_lan
[2022/05/10 17:33:32]:Emre:I've been using you for 4 years

[2022/05/10 17:33:56]:Emre:I am not new, I request you not to make us suffer for this simple situation.
[2022/05/10 17:34:25]:Lucas - Comm100:This is support channel we can only give 2 days
[2022/05/10 17:34:28]:Emre:Losing my customers $2000 per day to see them closed
[2022/05/10 17:34:37]:Lucas - Comm100:Talk with Brian
[2022/05/10 17:34:48]:Emre:ok now give me 2 days.
[2022/05/10 17:34:57]:Emre:i will openy skype can you give me pls  skype adress.
[2022/05/10 17:35:34]:Lucas - Comm100:Your account is reactivated
[2022/05/10 17:35:34]:Emre:you can open the system quickly please

[2022/05/10 17:35:39]:Emre:thank you.
[2022/05/10 17:35:45]:Lucas - Comm100:Talk with Brian for more days
[2022/05/10 17:35:50]:Lucas - Comm100:Bye

[2022/04/19 16:55:19]:Walid - Comm100:Please clear the bill to activate the account

[2022/04/19 16:58:18]:Walid - Comm100:Please clear the bill within this time. We cannot extend it for longer 
[2022/04/19 16:58:51]:hello ı a am efe:Don't you have time until 12:00 tomorrow?
[2022/04/19 16:59:41]:Walid - Comm100:Do you understand that you are already 12 days late for your payment? 
[2022/04/19 17:01:09]:hello ı a am efe:I understand, but we scheduled our payments for Wednesday, please help me with this.

[2022/04/19 17:01:55]:Walid - Comm100:Alright ! For the last time. Please don't ask for any more extension.
[2022/04/19 17:02:18]:Walid - Comm100:Your account is open

[2022/04/19 17:04:52]:hello ı a am efe:yes, as I said, we have set the payments to Wednesday, it will be more regular next month

[2022/04/11 18:36:17]:Walid - Comm100:Hello Cristina, How are you doing today? You have contacted Comm100 Technical Support team. What do you need help with?

[2022/04/11 18:40:38]:Walid - Comm100:Alright

[2022/04/11 18:43:13]:Cristina:This situation makes that the client get angry and put a one star.

[2022/04/08 14:10:32]:Arnel:not this year but this month

[2022/04/08 14:13:44]:Arnel:i dont get it.
[2022/04/08 14:13:57]:Arnel:i can't just answer something like that to the customer :)
[2022/04/08 14:14:44]:Walid - Comm100:I know that browser sometimes disables Javascript for idle tabs. When that happens agents will be logged out because browser won't communicate with the server 
[2022/04/08 14:15:35]:Walid - Comm100:For the agents who are using the browser, actively using the app, and have a stable internet connection won't get disconnected 
[2022/04/08 14:17:22]:Walid - Comm100:Developing the feature for the Web app is the only way Users can have it for the web version of the agent console. I don't see any other way around it. 
[2022/04/08 14:18:15]:Walid - Comm100:I do understand your concern that some organizations might not allow third party app installation. 
[2022/04/08 14:19:53]:Arnel:anyway thanks.
[2022/04/08 14:20:13]:Arnel:i have escalated the issue  to rachel.
[2022/04/08 14:20:18]:Arnel:thanks.

[2022/04/08 14:20:39]:Walid - Comm100:Let us know if you need help with anything else. Bye
